title: Personal Profile & Amazon Product Advertising App

requirements.text: Create a personal profile page that includes a profile photo placeholder, display name, bio/tagline, and social handle fields — styled as a personal brand landing page for Amazon product promotion.

quotes: I need to use my profile for advertising for Amazon product's

acceptanceCriteria: Profile page displays a circular avatar placeholder, name, bio, and optional tagline
Profile data is persisted in the backend and editable by the owner
Page is publicly viewable and renders cleanly as a personal brand landing page

requirements.text: Create an Amazon product showcase section where the user can add, edit, and remove product listings. Each listing must include: product title, description, thumbnail image URL, Amazon affiliate product URL, and an optional price display.

quotes: I need to use my profile for advertising for Amazon product's

acceptanceCriteria: User can add a product with title, description, image URL, Amazon link, and optional price
Products are stored in the backend and associated with the user profile
Each product card displays a thumbnail, title, price (if set), short description, and a prominent 'View on Amazon' button linking to the affiliate URL
User can edit or delete any of their product listings

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity authentication so only the profile owner can edit their profile and manage their product listings. Unauthenticated visitors can view the profile and products but cannot make changes.

quotes: I need to use my profile for advertising for Amazon product's

acceptanceCriteria: Login/logout button is visible in the header
Edit profile and add/edit/delete product actions are only available when authenticated
Unauthenticated users see a fully rendered read-only profile and product showcase

requirements.text: Apply a bold, modern e-commerce influencer visual theme: warm amber and charcoal tones, clean card-based product grid layout, strong typography for the profile hero section, and subtle hover animations on product cards. Enforce this style consistently across all pages and components.

quotes: I need to use my profile for advertising for Amazon product's

acceptanceCriteria: Warm amber accent color is used for CTAs and highlights throughout
Charcoal/dark background with light text is used for the hero profile section
Product listings are displayed in a responsive grid of cards
Product cards have a subtle scale or shadow hover animation
Typography is bold and modern, consistent across headings and body text

requirements.text: Render the generated branding images (profile hero banner and product placeholder) as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: I need to use my profile for advertising for Amazon product's

acceptanceCriteria: Hero banner image is loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.png
Default product placeholder image is loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated/product-placeholder.png

constraints: All affiliate and product links must open in a new browser tab
No external payment integrations — product links go directly to Amazon URLs provided by the user
Authentication must use Internet Identity only
nonGoals: Automatic Amazon product scraping or API integration with Amazon
Multi-user storefronts — this is a single-user personal profile

required: Wide hero banner with warm amber gradient, subtle bokeh lights, and abstract shopping/lifestyle background elements (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Neutral soft-tone product card placeholder illustration with a simple gift box and sparkle icons (product-placeholder.dim_400x400.png)
